DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate bioequivalence two treatment , administration CJ-30059 co-administration candesartan cilexetil amlodipine besylate , healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Male volunteer age 19 55 year old ( inclusive ) Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.5 27 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Available entire study period Understand requirement study voluntarily consent participate study Subjects history gastrointestinal disease might significantly change absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion ( ADME ) medicine Systolic blood pressure outside range 100 150 mmHg diastolic blood pressure outside range 70 1000 mmHg male subject screen Subject symptom acute disease within 14days prior study drug administration Subjects history clinically significant allergy Subjects hereditary problem , example , galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption Subjects whose clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range . Especially , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alamin aminotransferase ( ALT ) > 1.5 time Upper Normal Limit total bilirubin > 1.5 time Upper Normal Limit ) History drug abuse History caffeine , alcohol , smoke abuse caffeine ( coffee , tea , coke ) grapefruit juice > 4 cups/day smoking > 20 cigarettes/day alcohol > 140 g/week Positive test result Hepatitis B antibody , Hepatitis C virus antibody , Syphilis regain test Participation clinical investigation within 30 day prior study drug administration Subjects whole blood donation within 60 day , component blood donation within 30days blood transfusion within 30 day prior study drug administration Subjects judge unsuitable investigator
